title: How is Mylene Farmer's status in France? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s… fine. I feel like she’s not as popular as she once was, but she’s still well-known. She has a lot of die-hard fans but her music is quite peculiar so it’s the kind of music you love or you hate. She’s not very much in the public eye, but she’s recognized as a well-known French singer. That’s about it really, nothing much.
